alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Powder River; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 1:24AM MST until January 21 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...A mix of rain, freezing rain and wet snow will taper off through early this morning. Total snow accumulations up to one inch is possible, mainly over the higher hills. Ice accumulations will be less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Carter, Custer, Fallon, Powder River and Southern Rosebud. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads are slick and hazardous in spots. Low lying areas will hold on to ice accumulations the longest. Plan on difficult and rapidly changing road conditions through this morning. drive with extra caution, or delay travel until roadways melt off mid-day. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Walking surfaces will be slick and ice covered in many areas. Please take precautions to prevent slip falls.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
